scripts.firebase:build: npm run firebase:clean; npm run nuxt:build; npm run firebase:build:hosting; npm run firebase:build:functions
scripts.firebase:build:hosting: mkdir -p dist/hosting/_nuxt; cp -R app/static/ dist/hosting; cp -R .nuxt/dist/client/ dist/hosting/_nuxt
scripts.firebase:build:functions: mkdir -p dist/functions/.nuxt/dist/server; cp -R functions/ dist/functions; cp -R .nuxt/dist/server/ dist/functions/.nuxt/dist/server
